adjective.description: Having no match or equal; unrivaled.

noun.description: An unrivaled or matchless person or thing.
A flat round candy made of chocolate covered with white sugar sprinkles.
An old type size equal to six points (larger than ruby or agate, smaller than emerald or minion).

origin: Late Middle English: from French, from non- not + pareil equal (from popular Latin pariculus, diminutive of Latin par equal).
